title: Subpart 8-1 - Power Driven
content:
Subpart 8-1 - Power Driven

State Regulations

Definition of Terms (§ 8-1.1)

General (§ 8-1.2 to 8-1.9)

Plans for Hoistway and Elevator Installations (§ 8-1.10 to 8-1.12)

Passenger and Freight Hoistways (§ 8-1.13 to 8-1.20)

Hoistway Doors and Gates for Passenger and Freight Installation (§ 8-1.21 to 8-1.30)

Car and Safety Operating Devices and Equipment (§ 8-1.31 to 8-1.36)

Safety Equipment (§ 8-1.37 to 8-1.38)

Guide Rails (§ 8-1.39)

Cars (§ 8-1.40 to 8-1.42)

Counterweights (§ 8-1.43 to 8-1.44)

Cables (§ 8-1.45)

Platform Elevators (§ 8-1.46)

Power Driven Sidewalk Elevators (§ 8-1.47)

Power Driven Dumbwaiters (§ 8-1.48)

Automatic Push Button Control Elevators (§ 8-1.49)

Escalators (§ 8-1.50)

Power Driven Hoists (§ 8-1.51)

Prohibitions and Precautions (§ 8-1.52)

Specifications (§ 8-1.53 to 8-1.59)

Fireproof Materials (§ 8-1.60 to 8-1.62)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
